payload.title: Fix agent prompt copy during project initialization
payload.description:
Resolve 'Warning: Could not copy @gitgov agent prompt' when gitgov init is run with npm-installed @gitgov/cli. 

Implementation:
1. Create packages/core/prompts/ directory with synced agent prompts
2. Implement sync-prompts.ts script for automatic synchronization
3. Update package.json to include prompts/ in npm package
4. Update ProjectAdapter to use correct path for npm package structure
5. Add functional tests for agent prompt copy
6. Update documentation (scripts_module.md, README.md)

Technical details:
- Agent prompt source: docs/gitgov_agent_prompt.md (monorepo root)
- Package location: packages/core/prompts/ (synced via script)
- NPM path resolution: __dirname + ../../prompts/ (from dist/src/)
- Automatic sync: Runs in prebuild pipeline

Verification:
- Tests: 23/23 passing in ProjectAdapter
- NPM package: prompts/ included (16.6KB)
- Build: Automatic sync in prebuild working
- Clean: prompts/* cleaned with clean:generated
